title: Autobiography of Mrs. Fletcher.
author: Fletcher
snippet: He walked close up to me, and it was not till his dark countenance relaxed into a smile that I half screamed out, ' Sinclair CuUen ! ' He had arrived in the mail that morning, and was on his way to Kinfauns Castle.
